sentences.en: Nicotine adversely affects the functioning of the heart and arteries.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁对心脏和动脉功能有负面影响。

sentences.en: Price changes must not adversely affect the living standards of the people.
sentences.cn: 价格变化一定不能负面地影响人们的生活水平。

sentences.en: Because each individual is short-lived, the population of an opportunist species is likely to be adversely affected by drought, bad winters, or floods.
sentences.cn: 因为每个个体的生命都是短暂的，“机会主义者”这类物种的群体数量很可能受到干旱、严冬或者洪水等不利因素的影响。
